name: ClockWork (itch) (kegnor)
description:
Align the clock handles so they can connect with their corresponding connectors

This is a submission to the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 

you can get the music traks used here at https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/dynamic-music-pack-35925

please note that the android version is slightly different from the browser version to acomodate for mobile controls, (the biggest difference being that in the android version you move the handles by touching the screen rather than the handles themselves)
